snippet: Under Mike Woodson, both as the interim coach last season and as the permanent coach now, the Knicks have gone 18-1 in regular-season games at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: New York Knicks have gone 18-1 in regular-season games at Madison Square Garden under coach Mike Woodson; Woodson is one of five NBA coaches in last 20 seasons who have won at least 18 games in their first 20 home games with one team.
lead_paragraph: Under Mike Woodson, both as the interim coach last season and as the permanent coach now, the Knicks have gone 18-1 in regular-season games at Madison Square Garden.

headline.seo: Story of Knicks’ Success Begins at Home
headline.main: Story of Knicks’ Success Begins at Home
headline.print_headline: Story of Knicks’ Success Begins at Home
